channel.title: [PI] Help Please
channel.description: I dont need anymore help with this i fixed. All i had to do was load the crowns through a folder in the cache

item.title: [PI] Help Please
item.dc:creator: @gimpie gimpie
item.description:
@gimpie wrote:

[quote=“NieX, post:11, topic:522036”][quote author=tgm clan link=topic=640545.msg4316246#msg4316246 date=1371522259]

I know it has nothing to with the yell command. it has something to do with the cache. Do you know if there is a way to make the crowns load through a folder in the cache instead of it being packed into the cache?

It’s not cache sided. It’s source sided. It’ll be in your commands.java - <img(num)> is declared in the wrong place. ctrl + F in commands.java and search for (yell)
Then look for something along the lines of && c.playerRights >=2
or c.playerRights == 3;
and re-order the placement of the

facepalm That’s kind of what I said…
[/quote]

aww no is it? Aww facepalm you got me! facepalm doubleFacepalm. Stop being so obnoxious with your irrelevant retro-progressive snide remarks. QUADfacepalm <-- Incredible. It’s like i’ve broken into the space-time continuum vortex and manipulated the idea of your tgm acronym to represent “Trees grow muffins”; I then later used this slogan to inspire myself to invent such a tree to hopefully develop a new source of photosynthesis resulting in your clan to fail the laws of physics and drift off to nothing but distended nothingness in outer space. Where you’d be referred to as a planet due to your obesity on earth.[/quote]

^ At the same ima be playing some banjo, peace nigZ!

Read full topic

It’s not cache sided. It’s source sided. It’ll be in your commands.java - <img(num)> is declared in the wrong place. ctrl + F in commands.java and search for (yell)
Then look for something along the lines of && c.playerRights >=2
or c.playerRights == 3;
and re-order the placement of the
[/quote]
facepalm That’s kind of what I said…[/quote]

aww no is it? Aww facepalm you got me! facepalm doubleFacepalm. Stop being so obnoxious with your irrelevant retro-progressive snide remarks. QUADfacepalm <-- Incredible. It’s like i’ve broken into the space-time continuum vortex and manipulated the idea of your tgm acronym to represent “Trees grow muffins”; I then later used this slogan to inspire myself to invent such a tree to hopefully develop a new source of photosynthesis resulting in your clan to fail the laws of physics and drift off to nothing but distended matter in outer space, where you’d later be referred to as a planet by other organisms due to your obesity on earth.

Then look for something along the lines of && c.playerRights >=2
or c.playerRights == 3;

I know it has nothing to with the yell command. it has something to do with the cache. Do you know if there is a way to make the crowns load through a folder in the cache instead of it being packed into the cache?

It’s not cache sided. It’s source sided. It’ll be in your commands.java - <img(num)> is declared in the wrong place. ctrl + F in commands.java and search for (“yell”)
Then look for something along the lines of && c.playerRights >=2
or c.playerRights == 3;
and re-order the placement of the
